definition: (of fire, lamp etc) to go out/to put out (fire)/(fig.) to die down/(of a vehicle) to stall
to extinguish/to put out (fire)/to quench/to stop burning/to go out (of fire, lamp etc)/to come to an end/to wither away/to die out/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
surname Huo

sentences.english: The engine shut off, and we coasted to a stop.
sentences.chinese: 引擎熄火了，我们滑行了一段后停了下来。

sentences.english: The tow- truck ended up with its front end in the home's in-ground pool.
sentences.chinese: 这辆拖车因为车头在这个家的游泳池里停住而熄火了。

sentences.english: Halfway up the hill,the engine pooped out.
sentences.chinese: 在上山的半路上，发动机熄火了。

sentences.english: Then the car refused to start after the engine had been turned off for about ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 而当这车的引擎熄火大约十分钟后就再也打不着了。

sentences.english: The engine gave a sputter and died.
sentences.chinese: 引擎发出一阵劈啪声就熄火了。

sentences.english: When they fly across a the Alps, 3 engine of the plane are abrupt flameout .
sentences.chinese: 当他们飞越阿尔卑斯山时，飞机的3个引擎突然熄火。

sentences.english: The helicopter does not have to be pirouetting when the Autorotation starts.
sentences.chinese: 在执行熄火降落的动作之前，机体不须保持自旋。

sentences.english: Add milk and boil. Cover until cool.
sentences.chinese: 加牛奶，煮开后熄火放凉。

sentences.english: Lighter does not self extinguish close lid to put it out.
sentences.chinese: 打火机不会自己熄灭，要熄火盖盖儿。

sentences.english: My engine actually flamed out as I reached the parking area.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，当我回到停机屏时，发动机的确已经熄火了。

sentences.english: Remove from heat and add minced cilantro as well seasoning B, then remove to plate and serve.
sentences.chinese: 熄火后加入切碎的香菜末和调味料B，即可熄火盛出。

sentences.english: Remove from heat and add minced cilantro as well seasoning B, then remove to plate and serve.
sentences.chinese: 熄火后加入切碎的香菜末和调味料B，即可熄火盛出。

sentences.english: Bob was in a pickle when his car broke down in a pouring rainstorm.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃的汽车在倾盆大雨中熄火，使他狼狈不堪。

sentences.english: If still invalid, can throw decompression, make the engine flameout lever decompression.
sentences.chinese: 若仍无效，可扳动减压拉杆减压，使发动机熄火。

sentences.english: Chandler: Then put out fire by peeing, no get invited back.
sentences.chinese: 然后撒尿熄火，从此成为拒绝往来户。

sentences.english: These seeds are eaten after the fire is extinguished.
sentences.chinese: 在熄火后，人们会吃掉这些种子。

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
see 放空擋|放空挡[fang4 kong1 dang3]
to start up (a motor)/to launch (a computer application)
to step on the brake/to brake (when driving)
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
to put into gear/to engage the gear/gear change
to ignite/to light a fire/to agitate/to start an engine/ignition/fig. to stir up trouble
accelerator (pedal)/gas pedal/throttle
parking brake
accelerator pedal
ignition switch
electric switch
to accelerate/to step on the gas
oil pump
to reboot/to restart
brake pedal
